devops.name: DevOps
devops.description: If you want to actually ship, scale, or collaborate with a team, here's where you learn how.

wordpress.name: WordPress
wordpress.description: The most popular website management software on the web. This group caters to developers, designers, publishers, and DIYers.

r.name: R
r.description: Have data, need stats? Use R.

experience-design.name: UX Design
experience-design.description: This is a group for UX design practitioners and those interested in learning about design.

demo-night.name: Demo Night
demo-night.description: Bring your favorite new project or product, give a quick demo, and finish with some light convo. Anyone can present, even kids!

glass.name: SQL Server
glass.description: If you're living in Microsoft's world, you'll want to keep up with SQL Server and related technologies.

coldfusion.name: ColdFusion
coldfusion.description: This webdev platform features its own IDE, markup language, scripting language, and tight integration with the Adobe ecosystem.

marketing-hackers.name: Marketing Hackers
marketing-hackers.description: A community dedicated to marketers and techies who want to become power users in marketing apps and services.

misec.name: #misec
misec.description: Learn why security is so important, how to protect the applications you work on, and break them before a hacker can.

web.name: Web
web.description: Share your latest project, talk about tools you're using, network, trade advice, or just chat about the web.

jvm.name: Java
jvm.description: One of the most popular languages in the world with an incredibly rich ecosystem.

freecodecamp.name: freeCodeCamp
freecodecamp.description: Want to get started on learning development? Join us for the Lansing freeCodeCamp meeting to start your development journey or just ask questions.

javascript.name: JavaScript
javascript.description: When coding for the browser, there's usually only one choice; fortunately, it has one of the most thriving and innovative communities around.

makers.name: Lansing Makers
makers.description: Diverse people and experiences coming together in a safe environment to meld technology, art, and culture in new and exciting ways.

dotnet.name: .NET
dotnet.description: One of the most popular ecosystems for enterprise web development, with tooling built and supported by Microsoft.

code-retreat.name: Code Retreat
code-retreat.description: Try, practice, learn. Enjoy a Saturday pairing on exercises to expand your collaborative coding skills.

agile.name: Agile
agile.description: It's easy to spin your wheels pounding at the keyboard, but a focus on process will make you orders of magnitude more effective.

software-testing.name: Software Testing
software-testing.description: The last line of defense against bugs and poor design.

code-for-lansing.name: Code for Lansing
code-for-lansing.description: If you're looking to volunteer your technical skills for the good of your community, join Lansing's Code for America brigade.
